name: Puri
howtoreach:
By Air
Puri does not have an airport. Nearest airport is Bhubaneswar Biju Pattnaik International Airport, 60 KM.

By Rail
Puri is a terminus on the East Coast Railway having direct express and super fast train links with New Delhi, Mumbai, Kolkata, Okha, Ahmedabad, Tirupati etc. Some important trains are Kolkata (Howrah) Puri Howrah Express, Jagannath Express; New Delhi; Purushottam Express. Khurda Road Station, 44 km, from Puri is convenient rail head for train to Chennai and Western India.

By Road
The bus stand near the Gundicha Temple provides connections to Bhubaneswar and Cuttack, service every 10-15 minutes. Minibuses to Konark leave every 20-30 minutes . There are direct buses for Kolkata and Visakhapatnam.
stay: Puri offers a range of accommodation options to suit different preferences and budgets. Here are some popular areas and types of places to consider

hotels.name: 1.Beachfront Hotels:
hotels.description: Many visitors prefer staying close to the beach. Options like The Mayfair Waves, Hotel Hans Coco Palms, and Swosti Premium offer great views and easy beach access.

hotels.name: 2.Heritage Hotels:
hotels.description: For a more cultural experience, consider places like The Toshali Sands or Hotel Sea Horse, which reflect local architecture and charm.

hotels.name: 3.Budget Hotels and Guesthouses:
hotels.description: If you're looking for budget-friendly options, there are many guesthouses and budget hotels, such as Jagannath Guest House and New Sea Hawk.

hotels.name: 4.Near Jagannath Temple:
hotels.description: Staying close to the temple can be convenient for devotees. Options include Hotel Grand Mangal and Hotel Holiday Resort.

hotels.name: 5.Luxury Resorts:
hotels.description: For a more upscale experience, consider resorts like [The Puri Beach Resort](https://www.hotelpuribeachresort.com/) or Ramada by Wyndham Puri.When choosing where to stay, consider your priorities, whether it’s proximity to the beach, the temple, or local attractions
